item.title: Proximity Sense AR
item.description: iOS AR Spatial Computing Haptics My Most Experimental App Experience the world in a whole new way with Proximity Sense AR! Our innovative app uses augmented reality technology to sense the distance to objects around you and translate that information into a pattern of vibrations. Simply point your phone in front of you and let the vibrations guide you. The closer you get to an object, the more intense the vibrations become.
